# In order to work with the "mu" Lambda function management tool,
# we need PyYAML 3.x, and need it as source and not a wheel
pyyaml
# for building generated policy docs

# to match up with c7n / c7n-mailer dependencies
boto3==1.13.24
botocore==1.16.24
docutils==0.15.2
jmespath==0.9.5
